section.name: Introduction
section.p: This Reference contains information about how to use Torque as a Object-Relational mapper (a tool that maps from relational databases to java classes). Torque 4.0 requires JDK 1.6 or higher, Torque 5.0,5.1 JDK 1.8 or higher.
To access a database with Torque, the following steps are needed, which are described in this documentation in detail:

ul.li: Define a schema file describing the database structure (tables, columns etc.)
Generate classes and database creation files from the schema.
Use the generated classes (and the torque-runtime library classes) to access the database.
